amendment.description: Amendment sought to limit the asset threshold increase to $5 billion for bank holding companies and savings and loan holding companies which have submitted to the Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System a credible plan to expand access to banking accounts and services, consumer and small business credit products, and bank branches in rural, low income, minority, and otherwise under served communities.
amendment.purpose: An amendment No. 1 printed in Part B of House Report 114-489 to limit the asset threshold increase to $5 billion for bank holding companies and savings and loan holding companies which have submitted to the Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System a credible plan to expand access to banking accounts and services, consumer and small business credit products, and bank branches in rural, low-income, minority, and otherwise under-served communities.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Kelly (IL) amendment (A001) Failed by the Yeas and Nays: 165 - 253 (Roll no. 147).

action.text: Amendment failed by House: On agreeing to the Kelly (IL) amendment (A001) Failed by the Yeas and Nays: 165 - 253 (Roll no. 147).
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Kelly (IL) amendment (A001) Failed by the Yeas and Nays: 165 - 253 (Roll no. 147).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A001) offered by Ms. Kelly (IL).
